details.title: Pixalate Jr.
details.description: An on the spot photography event on a given topic.

details.title: Pixelate Sr.
details.description: Participants would be given a topic on the spot to shoot a photograph in a limited time.

details.title: Hi-Res
details.description: An online movie making competition, where a movie with a message is to be created and sent.

details.title: Camistic
details.description: A storyboard where participants create a story using pictures and provide a suitable title to it.

details.title: CreADive
details.description: An Ad-making competition where participants would shoot and edit an advertisement.

details.title: Surprise
details.description: A surprise event whose details would be disclosed on the spot and participants perform accordingly.

details.title: Rendered
details.description: Online Photo Manipulation Competition, in which participants have to manipulate a photo in certain way.

details.title: Phonescape Sr.
details.description: An on the spot phone photography event on the given topic.

details.title: Phonescape Jr.
details.description: An on the spot phone photography event on the given topic.
